definition: The action of taking someone into custody, typically performed by law enforcement authorities in response to suspected criminal activity. It commonly refers to the act of arresting or apprehending an individual.

examples.german: Die Polizei hat eine Festnahme gemacht.

examples.english: The arrest took place at the crime scene.

examples.english: The arrest of the suspect was successful.

examples.english: The arrest was broadcasted by the media.

examples.english: The arrest led to the solving of the crime.
